animeTitle: Marimo no Hana: Saikyou Butouha Shougakusei Densetsu
animeDescription: The story of the manga centers around Marimo Nogami, a usually quiet fourth-grade girl in elementary school. However, a certain incident leads to Marimo's personal strength blossoming. (Source: ANN)
